class.name: Swabra
class.description: A [build feature](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Build+Files+Cleaner+(Swabra)) cleaning files and processes created during a build

function.name: swabra
function.description: Adds a [build feature](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Build+Files+Cleaner+(Swabra)) cleaning files and processes created during a build @see Swabra

param.name: swabra.enabled
param.description: A files cleanup mode to use @see FilesCleanup

param.name: swabra.strict
param.description: Force [clean checkout](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Clean+Checkout) if cannot restore clean directory state

param.name: swabra.processes
param.description: Whether to inspect the checkout directory for processes locking files in this directory, and what to do with such processes

param.name: swabra.verbose
param.description: Enables detailed logging to build log

param.name: swabra.rules
param.description: A newline-separated set of +|-:path rules to define what files and directories should be cleaned
